snippet: European Central Bank oversight of euro-zone banks is just one piece of the puzzle.
abstract: Editorial welcomes decision by European leaders to designate a single supervisor for large banks in euro zone; asserts move must be followed by other stabilization measures, including deposit insurance, system for recapitalizing and shutting down banks, and  eventual establishment of a fiscal and political union.
lead_paragraph: European Central Bank oversight of euro-zone banks is just one piece of the puzzle.

headline.seo: A Step Forward in the Euro Crisis
headline.main: A Step Forward in the Euro Crisis
headline.print_headline: A Step Forward in the Euro Crisis
